title: Can't click login button after entering username and password
body: I originally had the "Cannot connect as you might be offline issue" so I went in, erased the line of code necessary and it fixed it. Just started another ranked game and game crashed at loadup screen. Exited out, started back up, entered username and password but I can't click the button to log in as it stays grayed out. Any help in this matter would be greatly appreciated, thanks.

replies.body: If you have the problem and can't fix it https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline
Why are there no instructions on how to solve this problem on the oce client sever status ?

This just happened to me too.  I won a match and the league window just disappeared. I did a full reboot of my pc and could not click the login button. Tried a full repair and still cannot click, the login button is greyed out.

I had the same issue. I uninstalled and reinstalled ,  its working fine now.
{{summoner:14}}
OMFGM THIS JUST HAPPENED TO ME AS WELL THIS IS SO BULLSH*T (i know im in caps which shows how tilted i am) {{champion:157}}

Ok I did restart my laptop many times but still can't sign in too. 
But I have solutions for awhile 
delete your username and rewrite then enter password it worked to me

Same thing happened to me during a game. My wifi dced so I reloaded and the Sign In button would stay grey. I removed that code but now I am facing something different. Please take this into consideration because these type of things give us 20 min bans before games and its really irritating. Thank you in advance.
I just got remaked upon and lost LP because of this. At least the rioter's fix worked. ://///

Hmmmm that is pretty weird the same issue started happening again right after you had fixed it. I know it doesn't sound like the best solution, but I would suggest running through [**these steps again**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline) to make sure that line of code didn't reset itself in some way. Hit me back up and let me know if that doesn't help though!

Side note, after waiting about 5-10 minutes it will let me log back in. It's irritating though because it happens during load in screen for ranked games so my teammates have to remake which is a waste of everyone's time.
Yeah it's still happening. Checked the code, that line is still gone. This seems to be a completely different issue entirely.

I'm having the same issue. Is this what the yellow exclamation point in the client is referring to? Plz help

Edit: Nevermind, I followed the instructions on the server status page and it went back to working just fine
